text: Gyula Katona (7 April 1879 - 26 July 1944) was a Hungarian gymnast. He competed in the men's individual all-around event at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Hungarian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Hungary Category:Gymnasts at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:People from Somogy County
title: Gyula Katona (gymnast)
